channel.title: Defining a random variable?

item.title: Defining a random variable?
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

defining a random variableâ€¦ How?

EX:

random int:

[code]public static int Spider[] = {1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2};

public static int randomSpider()
{
	return Spider[(int)(Math.random()*Spider.length)];
}	[/code]

what I want (LOL, if only coding worked like this)

[code]public static int Spider[] = {dog(), cat(), dog()};
// dog() and cat() are variables :S

public static variable randomSpider()
{
	return Spider[(variable)(Math.random()*Spider.length)];
}	[/code]

Now, how is this possible, so I can refer to it later. EX:

[code]if (useItemID == 301 && atObjectID == 879)

{
randomSpider(); // does EITHER cat(); or dod();

                            }[/code]

Read full topic
